tool_description: Integrates collected patient data from multiple sources into a unified medical record format, ensuring data consistency and proper medical record structure.

record_format.description: Output format for medical record (hl7, fhir, custom)

include_timeline.description: Whether to create chronological timeline of data

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must exist in the system.
Invalid data sources: Data sources must be from approved integration list.
Unsupported record format: Format must be one of [hl7, fhir, custom].
Data integration conflict: Conflicting information found between data sources.
Incomplete data: Required data missing from specified sources.
usage: Provide patient ID and list of data sources to integrate into unified medical record. Choose appropriate output format for your system requirements.

integration_status.description: Status of data integration (complete, partial, failed)

record_id.description: Unique identifier for integrated medical record

data_conflicts.description: List of data conflicts that need resolution

integration_summary.description: Summary of integration process and results
